pr_title: DHFPROD-5139: User with hub-central-entity-exporter role can't export data

timeline.message:
DHFPROD-5139: Allow hub-central-entity-exporter to export to CSV

Also correctly renamed a file in reference-entity-model

timeline.bodyText:
Instead of adding an extra call to export, we can modify the existing tests to remove "data-hub-operator" and "hub-central-saved-query-user" roles for the first test where we export using query document.
Next, we can add "hub-central-saved-query-user" for login when we test export using queryId which would require for a query to be saved.
timeline.author: akshaysonvane
